document_data.mainbody: '''Boom's Garden''' was a unique clothing store, located in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This shop was located in along the culdesac [[The Boomgarden]].
document_data.Structure: This structure was brick warehouse, whose bricks had been blackened in the past by smoke. It had a sky-blue awning above its front door.
document_data.Services:
This store sold a wide variety of unique clothing found nowhere else, in sizes ranging from small to extra large. They also offered special orders with complete measurements through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']]. Though that catalogued only offered a few of the most choice and tame items that the store had to offer.

The store offered a wide variety of armored undergarments,
document_data.History:
Prior to falling under the ownership of the woman [[Kar]] this warehouse belonged to a failed [[gnome]] inventor.

After having long been stupefied by the existence of armored undergarments, [[Aurora]] tracked down Boom's Garden and convinced its proprietor to do business through her catalogue.
